sections.summary:
Quality-focused and efficient Cook adept at preparing and plating food in high energy, fast-paced kitchens. I am Â seeking to use my culinary
skills to prepare a special variety of dishes in a professional, rewarding environment.
Highlights
Focused and disciplined.Â I have basic knife skills.Â
Works well under pressure.Â Knowledge of preparation of various food items.
High volume production capability. Plate presentation skills.Â
Ability to handle/resolve problems Sandwich preparation experience.
Reliable, punctual and committed to customer service Well-tuned palette
Accomplishments
I played a key role in the successful physical inventory of 10 million dollars worth of product, with an accuracy difference of .001%.Â
